info.readme:
Localgov Starter Kit 6.0.4 umbraco v7.4/5+

latest version of the hugely 'popular' localgov starter kit, built for Umbraco 7.4+ giving the start you need to build a stonking service driven website. Featuring:

  • templates
  • doctypes
  • datatypes
  • maps
  • navigation
  • search
  • the grid!
  • nice styles & other things too...

Info.Name: Components
Info.Description: Things that form part of another page, they don't appear in any navigation

GenericProperty.Name: IsComponent
GenericProperty.Description: Marks this item as a component (so it isn't shown in navigation or search or atoz)

Info.Name: Dated Content
Info.Description: Content that has a start or end date

Info.Name: Event
Info.Description: A thing that happens at a point in time

GenericProperty.Name: Main Item Count
GenericProperty.Description: Number of items shown in main block (default 6)

GenericProperty.Name: fromAddress
GenericProperty.Description: Email address - forms and the like can use when sending emails

Info.Name: Listing Page
Info.Description: A page for listing things like news, events,

Info.Name: News Item
Info.Description: A News item or press release

Info.Name: Pages
Info.Description: The basis of all pages on the site

GenericProperty.Name: Summary
GenericProperty.Description: Displayed on pages that list this page, such as gateway pages

GenericProperty.Name: Service Alerts
GenericProperty.Description: Select an alert to appear across the top of this page

GenericProperty.Name: ESD Service Id
GenericProperty.Description: ID For this service as defined in ESD Service List

Info.Name: Redirect
Info.Description: A Redirection to another page or site

Info.Name: Related Items
Info.Description: Things that are related to this page

GenericProperty.Name: Events Root
GenericProperty.Description: Where event pages live on the site.

GenericProperty.Name: Section Stylesheet
GenericProperty.Description: stylesheets applied to all pages in this section

GenericProperty.Name: News Root
GenericProperty.Description: Where news pages live in the site

Info.Name: Sitemap
Info.Description: A visual representation of the site contents

Info.Name: System Pages
Info.Description: Pages used for system things like search

Template.Name: Design
Template.Design:
@inherits Umbraco.Web.Mvc.UmbracoTemplatePage @using ClientDependency.Core.Mvc; @{ Layout = "Master.cshtml"; Html.RequiresCss("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Roboto:400,700|Ubuntu:400,700|Pacifico", 0); Html.RequiresCss("~/css/layout.css", 1); Html.RequiresCss("~/css/" + Umbraco.Field("sectionStylesheet", recursive: true, altText: "lgsk-default.css")); }
@Html.Partial("Page/CookieNotice")
@Umbraco.Field("siteName", recursive: true)
@Html.Partial("Nav/SiteNav", Model.Content, new ViewDataDictionary() { { "listClass", "nav navbar-nav navbar-right" } })
@if( IsSectionDefined("Breadcrumb")) { @RenderSection("Breadcrumb", required: false) } else {
@Html.Partial("Nav/Breadcrumb")
} @Html.Partial("Components/ServiceAlerts") @RenderSection("PageHeader", required: false)
@RenderBody()
@Html.Partial("Nav/AtoZList")
A to Z
@RenderSection("Footer", required: false)
@Html.Partial("Nav/FooterLinks")
The Localgov Starterkit an open source Jumoo thingy-me-bob
Localgov Starterkit 6, 2015 » ∞

Template.Name: Gateway Page
Homepage
Master
Redirect
Search
Section Homepage
Template.Design:
@inherits Umbraco.Web.Mvc.UmbracoTemplatePage @{ Layout = "Sections.cshtml"; } @section PageHeader {

@Umbraco.Field("title")

@CurrentPage.GetGridHtml("content", "lgsk-nested-bootstrap")
@Html.Partial("Components/Highlights")
}
@Html.Partial("Nav/GatewayLinks")

Template.Name: Sections
SideNav Pages
Venue Page

Number of results to show per page
Fields to show as the result preview
Maximum length of the preview text
Root content node to search from
Root media node to search from
Location of the search form (TOP, BOTTOM, BOTH, NONE)
